QuestData.Title: Aberrations
QuestData.Description: The Lich King sent emissaries to us on three different occasions. All three were promptly dismembered.$B$BOur sisters in Valkyrion were not as dedicated to our traditions and accepted the Scourge's advances. Now instead of capturing their drakes from the wild, they raise them from the blight and filth that the Scourge wallow in.$B$BTake the frost oil that the Valkyrion Hyldnir carry on them and use it to freeze any blighted eggs you find. Rumors speak of a fetid pool of blight where the eggs are kept.
QuestData.LogDescription: Thyra Kvinnshal in Brunnhildar Village wants you to go to Valkyrion and obtain Vials of Frost Oil from the Valkyrion Aspirants. Use the Vials of Frost Oil to destroy 30 Plagued Proto-Drake Eggs.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you destroy the blighted eggs?
QuestData.RewardText: You have our thanks, sister. We cannot allow our valiant traditions to be corrupted.
